A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yes\, it had its problems. I'm not alone in my dissatisfaction with the Finn and Rose storyline\, and I had some problems with their choices regarding Luke Skywalker's character. But it also had all the elements that make the Star Wars franchise one of my favorites. Moral delimmas\, epic space battles\, catchy dialog\, and great characters. I'm hoping they'll iron out the rough spots in the next installment\, butbin the meantime\, I'll be watching The Last Jedi 30-40 Times.
